comments:
Description:
Cascading parameter default value validation issue in Edit Parameter Dialog.
Build number:2.2.2.v20071113

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.
2. Edit the first Cascading Group.
3. Select the second orderdate sub parameter and click OK to close cascading parameter dialog.

Expected result:
Close the dialog without exception.

Actual result:
A BIRT exception occurred.
  Plug-in Provider:Eclipse.org
  Plug-in Name:BIRT Core Package
  Plug-in ID:org.eclipse.birt.core
  Version:2.2.2.v20071113-0630
  Error Code:CONVERT_FAILS
  Error Message:Can not convert the value of 10334 to java.sql.Date type.

Error log:

at org.eclipse.birt.core.data.DataTypeUtil.toSqlDate(DataTypeUtil.java:623)
